General.Name: Garcia Reguera S.A.
General.Description: García Reguera Sociedad Anónima Comercial, Industrial, Financiera e Inmobiliaria engages in the retail sale of home and personal items in Argentina. Its stores offer general garments for women, men, and children; bedroom items, table linens, and cases; and school articles. The company was founded in 1942 and is headquartered in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
